summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Batch Upload feature with auto-grouping and multi-draft generation. All backend APIs and frontend pages working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/jobs/{id} - Returns job progress and completes
Dashboard shows 'Batch Upload' button with correct navigation
NewBatch page (/batch/new) loads with drag&drop zone
BatchReview page (/batch/:id) shows groups and images correctly
Upload button correctly disabled when no files selected
Empty state handling in BatchReview page
All form elements have proper data-testid attributes
Error handling for invalid batch IDs
